activities.name: Semana Santa (Holy Week)
activities.description: Experience Madrid's solemn and spectacular Holy Week processions, featuring ornate religious floats, traditional music, and dramatic religious imagery through the historic streets.
activities.seasonal_notes: Dates vary each year (March-April) with processions throughout Holy Week, particularly impressive on Holy Thursday and Good Friday. Madrid's processions are known for their solemnity and historical significance.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; arrive early to secure viewing spots along the official routes. Plaza Mayor and Calle Mayor offer good vantage points. Book accommodation months in advance as this is peak visitor season.

activities.name: Madrid Open Tennis Tournament
activities.description: Watch world-class tennis at the Mutua Madrid Open, featuring top players competing on clay courts in the Caja Mágica complex.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held annually in May, this prestigious ATP and WTA tournament brings the world's best players to Madrid.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online through the tournament website as soon as they go on sale. Weekend matches and finals sell out quickly.

activities.name: Retiro Park Spring Gardens
activities.description: Explore the beautiful spring blooms in Madrid's most famous park, featuring the Crystal Palace, rose gardens, and seasonal flower displays.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring (April-May) brings spectacular blooms, particularly in the rose garden and around the Crystal Palace. The park's trees and flowers create a stunning display.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; arrive early to avoid crowds. Weekday mornings offer the most peaceful experience.

activities.name: Madrid Book Fair (Feria del Libro)
activities.description: Browse thousands of books and meet authors at this annual literary festival in Retiro Park, featuring book signings, readings, and cultural activities.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in late May/early June, this event transforms Retiro Park into a literary paradise with hundreds of book stalls and cultural activities.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; arrive early for popular author signings. Many events are free but some may require advance registration.

activities.name: Madrid Marathon
activities.description: Participate in or watch Madrid's annual marathon, which takes runners through the city's most iconic landmarks and streets.
activities.price_range: Free to watch, Moderate to participate
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in late April/early May, offering ideal running conditions with mild temperatures and clear skies.
activities.booking_tips: Register months in advance if participating. Spectators can watch from various points along the route; Plaza de Cibeles offers a great vantage point.

activities.name: Real Madrid vs Barcelona (El Clásico)
activities.description: Experience one of world football's greatest rivalries at Santiago Bernabéu Stadium when Real Madrid hosts Barcelona.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring matches often have significant implications for the league title, creating an electric atmosphere.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets sell out quickly; purchase through official channels as soon as they become available. Consider hospitality packages for guaranteed seats.

activities.name: Madrid Cocktail Week
activities.description: Sample creative cocktails from Madrid's best bars during this week-long celebration of mixology.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in May, featuring special cocktail menus and events at participating bars throughout the city.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase a wristband for access to special events and discounted cocktails. Some events require advance booking.

activities.name: Madrid Design Festival
activities.description: Experience exhibitions, installations, and events celebrating design in all its forms across various venues in Madrid.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring edition focuses on contemporary design with exhibitions, workshops, and talks throughout the city.
activities.booking_tips: Check the festival website for program details. Some events require advance registration.

activities.name: Spring Art Week
activities.description: Visit galleries and art spaces participating in this city-wide celebration of contemporary art.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in May, featuring special exhibitions and events at galleries throughout Madrid.
activities.booking_tips: Download the official map of participating venues. Many galleries offer extended hours during the festival.

activities.name: San Isidro Festival
activities.description: Experience Madrid's traditional festival honoring its patron saint, featuring bullfights, concerts, and traditional celebrations.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in mid-May, marking the beginning of summer with traditional celebrations and cultural events throughout the city.
activities.booking_tips: Bullfight tickets should be purchased in advance. Many street events are free but arrive early for good spots.

activities.name: Madrid Pride (Orgullo)
activities.description: Join one of Europe's largest LGBTQ+ celebrations featuring parades, concerts, and cultural events throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in early July, transforming the city with rainbow colors and celebrations in Chueca and beyond.
activities.booking_tips: Book accommodation months in advance. Many events are free but some parties require tickets.

activities.name: Veranos de la Villa
activities.description: Enjoy open-air concerts, theater performances, and cultural events in various venues across Madrid.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer-long festival offering cultural entertainment in outdoor venues throughout the city.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online when the program is announced. Popular events sell out quickly.

activities.name: Madrid Río Summer Activities
activities.description: Enjoy the Manzanares River park with swimming pools, outdoor activities, and cultural events along the river.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings various activities and events to this riverside park, including outdoor cinema and concerts.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required for most activities. Arrive early for popular events and swimming pools.

activities.name: Madrid Foodie Week
activities.description: Sample special menus and culinary events at participating restaurants throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer edition features special menus and culinary events showcasing Madrid's dining scene.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve tables in advance at participating restaurants. Special menus often require advance booking.

activities.name: Madrid Jazz Festival
activities.description: Experience jazz performances in various venues across the city, from intimate clubs to outdoor stages.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings jazz performances to various venues, including outdoor concerts in parks.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online for specific performances. Some venues offer season passes.

activities.name: Madrid's Rooftop Bars
activities.description: Enjoy drinks and views at Madrid's rooftop bars, which come alive during summer evenings.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings offer perfect conditions for rooftop dining and drinking with spectacular city views.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve tables in advance, especially for sunset views. Popular spots include The Hat, Círculo de Bellas Artes, and Hotel Riu.

activities.name: Madrid's Summer Sales
activities.description: Take advantage of summer sales at major shopping areas including Gran Vía, Calle Serrano, and various malls.
activities.seasonal_notes: Major sales begin in July with significant discounts at stores throughout the city.
activities.booking_tips: Visit early in the morning to avoid crowds. Many stores offer online shopping with in-store pickup.

activities.name: Madrid's Summer Cinema
activities.description: Watch movies under the stars at various outdoor cinema venues throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer brings outdoor cinema screenings to various locations, including parks and cultural centers.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online in advance. Bring blankets or chairs for comfortable viewing.

activities.name: Madrid International Film Festival
activities.description: Experience one of Spain's most important film festivals, featuring premieres, retrospectives, and special events.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in October, showcasing international and Spanish cinema with red carpet events and screenings.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online when the program is announced. Popular screenings sell out quickly.

activities.name: Madrid Wine Week
activities.description: Sample wines from across Spain at various events and tastings throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings wine-focused events and tastings, celebrating Spain's wine culture.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets for specific tastings in advance. Many events require advance registration.

activities.name: Madrid Fashion Week
activities.description: Experience Spain's premier fashion event, featuring runway shows and industry events.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn edition showcases upcoming spring/summer collections with various events and shows.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets are primarily for industry professionals, but some events are open to the public with advance booking.

activities.name: Madrid's Autumn Parks
activities.description: Enjoy the autumn colors in Madrid's parks, particularly Retiro and Casa de Campo.
activities.seasonal_notes: October-November brings beautiful autumn colors to Madrid's parks and gardens.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; visit on weekdays for fewer crowds. Early morning offers the best light for photography.

activities.name: Madrid's Autumn Gastronomy
activities.description: Sample seasonal dishes and participate in food events celebrating autumn ingredients.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings seasonal specialties including mushrooms, game, and traditional stews.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve tables at participating restaurants. Many offer special autumn tasting menus.

activities.name: Madrid's Autumn Art Exhibitions
activities.description: Visit major art exhibitions at Madrid's museums and galleries during the autumn season.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings major exhibitions to Madrid's museums, including the Prado, Thyssen, and Reina Sofía.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online in advance. Many museums offer combined tickets for multiple exhibitions.

activities.name: Madrid's Autumn Theater Season
activities.description: Attend performances at Madrid's theaters as the new season begins.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn marks the beginning of the theater season with new productions and performances.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online in advance. Many theaters offer season subscriptions.

activities.name: Madrid's Autumn Markets
activities.description: Browse seasonal products at various markets throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings seasonal products and special markets featuring local produce and crafts.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; arrive early for the best selection. Many markets offer guided tours.

activities.name: Madrid's Autumn Music Scene
activities.description: Enjoy concerts and performances at various venues throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn brings various music events and performances to Madrid's concert halls and venues.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online in advance. Many venues offer season subscriptions.

activities.name: Christmas Lights on Gran Vía
activities.description: Experience Madrid's spectacular Christmas light displays along Gran Vía and other major streets.
activities.seasonal_notes: Displayed from late November through early January, with synchronized light shows and festive decorations.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; shows typically run from 6pm to midnight. Most crowded on weekends and holidays.

activities.name: Three Kings Parade (Cabalgata de Reyes)
activities.description: Witness the traditional Three Kings parade through Madrid's streets on January 5th.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held on January 5th, featuring elaborate floats and candy distribution to children.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early for good viewing spots along the route. Bring bags for collecting candy.

activities.name: Madrid's Christmas Markets
activities.description: Browse traditional Christmas markets throughout the city, particularly in Plaza Mayor.
activities.seasonal_notes: Open from late November through December, featuring traditional crafts and holiday items.
activities.booking_tips: Visit on weekdays to avoid crowds. Plaza Mayor's market is the most traditional.

activities.name: Madrid's Winter Museums
activities.description: Explore Madrid's world-class museums during the quieter winter season.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter offers fewer crowds and special exhibitions at Madrid's major museums.
activities.booking_tips: Many museums offer free entry on certain days. Check schedules for special winter hours.

activities.name: Madrid's Winter Gastronomy
activities.description: Sample traditional winter dishes and seasonal specialties at restaurants throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter brings traditional dishes like cocido madrileño and seasonal specialties.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve tables in advance, especially for traditional restaurants. Many offer special winter menus.

activities.name: Madrid's Winter Theater
activities.description: Attend performances at Madrid's theaters during the winter season.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter brings various performances and productions to Madrid's theaters.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online in advance. Many theaters offer winter season subscriptions.

activities.name: Madrid's Winter Parks
activities.description: Enjoy Madrid's parks during the quieter winter season, particularly Retiro and Casa de Campo.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter offers peaceful walks and unique perspectives of Madrid's parks.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; visit on sunny days for the best experience.

activities.name: Madrid's Winter Shopping
activities.description: Take advantage of winter sales and shopping opportunities throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: January brings major sales with significant discounts at stores throughout Madrid.
activities.booking_tips: Visit early in the morning to avoid crowds. Many stores offer online shopping with in-store pickup.

activities.name: Madrid's Winter Sports
activities.description: Watch winter sports events or participate in indoor sports activities.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter brings various sports events and activities to Madrid's venues.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online in advance for specific events. Many venues offer winter sports packages.
